content.name: Bloodthirsty
content.description: Once per battle, after making a charge roll for a friendly unit, you re-roll that charge roll.

content.name: Inspired
content.description: Once per battle, after picking friendly unit to shoot or fight, **add 1 to wound rolls** for attacks made by that unit until the end of that phase.

content.name: Indomitable
content.description: Once per battle, after taking battleshock test for friendly unit, you can choose no models from that unit to flee in that battleshock phase.
